page.title: 03Employment-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: The village does not have much employment.Most people either go into the towns or work on farms. The{gunsmith}employs one other person. His assistant is the only woman gunsmith in the country.He restores and makes guns for people all over the world. The{post office}employs 4 part time workers and 2 full time.It has been a post office 40 years.Before that it was a habadashery.They sell general goods. The{wood shop}employs 2 full time workers.They sell garden furniture and joinery for local builders. The{nursery gardens}employ 8 workers, also the{garage,} the {hairdresser}and the{2 pubs}provide employment for our village.Several women have jobs cleaning for other people.A{gamekeeper and water bailiff work in the area.
